entry.def: Monarchical means relating to a monarch or monarchs.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or befitting a monarch or monarchy;

sentences.sentence: "a country that was monarchial in tradition"

means.word_mean: 2. having the characteristics of or befitting or worthy of a monarch;
3. ruled by or having the supreme power resting with a monarch;
